CreateImixDistributionCommand.title: Schema for the ImixInfo of the spirent.methodology.traffic.CreateImixDistributionCommand.

enable.description: A flag indicating if this command should run to create the IMIX distribution.

imixes.description: List of IMIX distributions that can be used by Streamblocks (e.g. from CreateTrafficMixCommand, etc).

name.description: Name of the FrameLengthDistribution to be created.

tag.description: Name of tag to create and associate with the IMIX distribution.

table.description: List of frame length slots in the IMIX distribution.

enable.description: A flag indicating if this slot should be used in the IMIX distribution.

weight.description: List of weights for each slot in the IMIX distribution.

frameLengthMode.description: frame distribution mode for the slot in the IMIX distribution.

fixedFrameLength.description: fixed frame sizes for the slot (used in fixed mode) in the IMIX distribution.

minFrameLength.description: min frame sizes for the slot (used in random mode) in the IMIX distribution.

maxFrameLength.description: max frame sizes for the slot (used in random mode) in the IMIX distribution.
